text:
Did you get the stationery, Rinze-chan?
...Huh? What are you looking at?
A special feature... on spring fragrances...

Wow, incense? There are so many varieties!
Cherry blossoms, plum... and here's wisteria!

What a lovely scent~...!
So this is the fragrance of wisteria...!

And over here... the scent of violets...
Sweet... and gentle...

Incense has that nice, airy scent, doesn't it?
...Rinze-chan, want to get one?

Right! Then maybe I'll get one too...!
Which one should I choose...?

For Rinze... the scent of red plum blossoms...
Hehe...
